stickyBar.message: Support our global mission! International funders and foundations, partner with us today!

items.title: Exploring Our Active Initiatives
items.description: Dive into our ongoing projects complete with descriptions and details about our funding partners. This section showcases the active efforts and collaborations that drive our current impact.

items.title: Celebrating Our Successes
items.description: Review our completed projects and the achievements they've brought. This area highlights the sustainable impact we've had and the lessons learned along the way.

items.title: Insights and Learnings
items.description: Access a wealth of knowledge through our detailed reports and publications. This repository includes comprehensive documentation of our work and its outcomes, providing transparency and insights into our methods and results.

items.title: Empowering Communities Through Diverse Initiatives
items.description: Dive into our diverse initiatives, which include Supportive Parenting, Financial Literacy and Economic Empowerment, Youth Empowerment, Ending Violence Against Women and Girls (VAWG), and Research and Advocacy efforts to drive societal change.

items.title: Explore Our Training Opportunities
items.description: Enhance your skills through our specialized training offerings, such as Parenting & Caregiver Training, Financial Literacy Training, Youth Entrepreneurship Training, and custom training solutions for NGOs, schools, and businesses. You can also request tailored training programs to meet specific needs.

items.title: Mission
items.description: State your organization's mission clearly, possibly with a short video. We aim to ensure every child, parent, and young person thrives by empowering families with parenting skills, enhancing communities through financial literacy, and providing youth with opportunities in entrepreneurship and job placement. By creating safe, nurturing environments and equipping individuals with essential skills, we seek to break cycles of poverty and violence, enabling Cambodian families and youth to lead resilient, self-sufficient lives.

items.title: Who We Are
items.description: Improving Cambodia’s Society through Skilful Parenting (ICS-SP) is a national non-profit organization established in July 2015. We aim to enhance family lives to positively impact the well-being of children and women. Our collaborative approach enables us to work effectively with partners and participants in our mission.

items.title: Teams
items.description: Introduce your team with photos and short bio and role.

items.title: Get in Touch with Us
items.description: Reach out to ICS-SP to collaborate or learn more about our initiatives to improve family lives and prevent violence through skillful parenting.

items.title: Volunteer & Internship Opportunities
items.description: Explore ways to engage with us through volunteer and internship opportunities.

items.title: Support Our Work
items.description: Support our initiatives by contributing through donations and participating in fundraising efforts.

footer.organizationName: Improving Cambodia’s Society through Skilful Parenting (ICS-SP)
